dict.acceptation: 招待；（为…）工作；对…有用；向…供应；
适合；服役；供职；[网球、羽毛球]发球；
网球等发球；发球权；所发的球；

sent.orig: Sony Notebook service technic stand by service center have perfect serve operate system sum serve network.
sent.trans: 索尼笔记本维修技术支持服务中心拥有完善的服务运作体系和服务网络。

sent.orig: We have servants who serve us, but they serve others.
sent.trans: 我们被仆人服务，他们为他人服务。

sent.orig: We should serve all our uncles as respectfully as we serve our own fathers.
sent.trans: 侍奉诸位伯叔舅父，如同侍奉自己的父亲一样恭敬。

sent.orig: Make the past serve the present and foreign things serve China.
Asus Notebook service technic stand by service center have perfect serve operate system sum serve network.
sent.trans: 华硕笔记本维修技术支持服务中心拥有完善的服务运作体系和服务网络。
